Function.DocText: /Docker /alpine-en-3.20.0-1-tunned.log /bin /boot /dev /etc /home /init /lib /lib32 /lib64 /libx32 /lost+found /media /mnt /opt /proc /root /run /sbin /snap /sources /srv /sys /tmp /tools /usr /var autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh Set_new_fifo autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh @author Arnaud Crampet autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh @see fifo_lib::UnSet_fifo() autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh @see fifo_lib::Do_fifo_init() autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh @param name objectname 'fifo' autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh @param attribut first attribut autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh @param ... optional attribut autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh List of attributs: autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh - filename=... the filename of fifo autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh - eof="..." end of line (used to close the fifo) autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh Usage: autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh - Create a FIFO autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh Examples: autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh - Set_new_fifo my_fifo filename=/tmp/my_fifo autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh - Set_new_fifo my_fifo filename=/tmp/my_fifo eof="END_OF_FILE" **/
